plugin.name: pluginator
plugin.author: Sergey Bondarenko
plugin.title: This plugin adds ability to hook into application's runtime configuration like if it is a plugin by itself.
plugin.description:
\ Plaginator allows to write the following configuration hooks in application: doWithWebDescriptor, doWithSpring, doWithDynamicMethods, doWithApplicationContext, onChange, onConfigChange
For instance, with doWithSpring you can adjust your web-xml if you need precise control over web-xml generation. Just add dependency on this plugin at the last line in your application.properties.
